tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crops (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    genetic_info JSONB,
    growth_stage ENUM('germination', 'vegetative', 'reproductive', 'fruiting'),
    date_planted DATE
);

CREATE TABLE traits (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trait_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    dominant BOOLEAN,
    crop_id INTEGER REFERENCES crops(id)
);

CREATE TABLE harvest (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INTEGER REFERENCES crops(id),
    harvest_date DATE,
    yield DECIMAL,
    quality_rating INTEGER CHECK(quality_rating >= 0 AND quality_rating <= 10)
);

CREATE TABLE crops (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    species VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE crop_characteristics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT REFERENCES crops(id),
    growth_time INT,
    yield_per_acre INT,
    storage_temperature INT
);

CREATE TABLE genetic_modifications (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    modification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    crop_id INT REFERENCES crops(id),
    modification_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    modification_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    study_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    study_description TEXT,
    crop_id INT REFERENCES crops(id)
);

CREATE TABLE crops (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  species VARCHAR(255),
  genetic_traits TEXT,
  growth_period VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_characteristics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  color VARCHAR(50),
  size VARCHAR(50),
  shape VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_locations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  altitude INT
);

CREATE TABLE crop_research (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
  research_topic VARCHAR(255),
  research_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE crop_production (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  harvest_date DATE,
  storage_conditions TEXT
);
